DOC.brief_summary: This study design compare pharmacokinetic pharmacodynamic characteristic safety oral administration Glucophage oral administration HL-018 healthy male volunteer
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial Compare Pharmacokinetics Pharmacodynamics After Oral Administration Glucophage HL-018
DOC.criteria: Adult male age 19 50 year screen . No significant congenital/chronic disease . No symptoms physical examination . Appropriate subject determine past medical history , laboratory test , serology urinalysis . Be able understand objective , method study , characteristic investigational drug , comply requirement study . Subject must provide write informed consent prior study participation . History presence liver , kidney , nervous system disease , respiratory disorder , endocrinological disorder , hematooncologic , cardiovascular psychiatric cognitive disorder . History gastrointestinal disorder ( bleed , ulceration , hemorrhoid , pile ) disorder absorption , distribution , metabolism , excretion . History known hypersensitivity drug include metformin .
